alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ouray and northeastern San Miguel Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ridgway, or 24 miles south of Montrose, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ridgway, Loghill Village and Colona. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 99 and 117. Colorado 62 between mile markers 7 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
